author: plujan
body:
This adds a pileup scenario for the 2018 ultra legacy, generated in the same way as the 2017 UL scenario #26572 . The new scenario is named "2018_25ns_UltraLegacy_PoissonOOTPU".

Since the automated tests won't actually exercise this scenario, I've tested it manually by running a cmsDriver command with --pileup 2018_25ns_UltraLegacy_PoissonOOTPU and verified that it runs correctly.
title: added pileup scenario for 2018 ultra legacy
